definition: A physical expression of affection typically involving the touching of lips, often used to convey love, passion, or tenderness between individuals. It is commonly exchanged between romantic partners, family members, or close friends as a gesture of intimacy or greeting.

examples.german: Sie gab ihm einen Kuss auf die Stirn
examples.english: She gave him a kiss on the forehead

examples.german: Er bekam einen Kuss auf den Mund
examples.english: He received a kiss on the mouth
She gave him a goodbye kiss

examples.german: Ein Kuss kann viele Gefühle ausdrücken
examples.english: A kiss can express many emotions
